job description:
Job Description

---- JOB SUMMARY ----

The Test Data Engineer Senior is responsible for evaluating test data requirements. producing test data delivery strategies. and helping the test data management team members in addressing delivery issues and/or other technical test data delivery questions. The Test Data Engineer Senior will act as a subject matter expert within data creation and processing for critical business systems.------

The Test Data Engineer Senior is expected to be a subject area expert in EDI X12 and Health Care industry claims processing. ------

Works closely with Business. Development and QA Partners to deliver test data that meet defined requirements for new and existing IT solutions.

---- ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS ----

Work with Test Data Manager in recommending/developing/implementing Test Data creation/loading/archiving solutions to improve services.---

Produce status reports on project related test data activities.---

Works as a Liaison between the Environments. Testing and Development team for data processing.---

Develop and maintain team procedures and process documentation.---

Manage and track data processing issues to resolution.---

Provide mentorship to junior or new team members.---

Provide work effort estimates and manage the processing of Test Data Requests.---

Review and approve Test Data Requirements.---

Create Test Data Files per user requirements.---

Process Test Data Files into target application environments per user requirements.---

Archive Test Data Files as needed.---

Act in the capacity of Test Data Engineer Lead when needed

Able to travel domestically---

Able to be on call and respond to emergencies 24 x 7 when required

---- MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS ----

A Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or MIS Required---or equivalent work experience Required ----

3+ years of experience in Software Development and/or Quality Engineering background Required---

1+ year of experience in the Healthcare Payer industry Required---

2+ years of experience in working with EDI X12 data Required---

3+ years of experience in Searching. inserting. updating and deleting data in a database environment using SQL. Required---

Other Advanced experience using automation tools in several different applications environments. Required ----

---- Technology ---

Microsoft Word Intermediate Required---

Microsoft Excel Intermediate Required---

Microsoft PowerPoint Intermediate Required---

Microsoft Outlook Intermediate Required---

Microsoft Visio Intermediate Required---

Microsoft Project Intermediate Required---

Other Must be familiar with Software Development and SDLC Intermediate Required---

Other Must be familiar with relational databases (Oracle. Access. SQL Server) to create and review databases. queries. and reports as required. Intermediate Required---

Other Ability to determine the best approach for testing applications and identifying data requirements and should also be familiar with how to diagnose and resolve problems in the creation and running of automation scripts. Intermediate Required---

Other Ability to interface with multiple teams in order to design a suitable workflow for the enterprise Intermediate Required---

Other Programming skills in VB. VB script. C. and SQL Beginner Preferred---

Other Strong knowledge of QA methodologies Intermediate Required
